==In Gantt you can make a task parent of another task. There are two possible ways to do this: ==

===1. Editing the task:===

1. Select the task you want to be the child.

2. Click on edit button. A Edit Task overlay shows up.

3. Click on Parent icon, next to the parent field.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskIcon.png" align="left" />

4. Select the task you want to be the parent.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskOverlay.png" align="left" />

5. Click on Save button.

The selected task in the step 4, is now the parent of the task selected in the step 1. The parent task change the color to green and is resized to fit the child task.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskOverview.png" align="left" />

===2. Using the right dentation button:===

1. Select the task you want to be the child.

2. Click on the right identation button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttParentTaskRightIdentationButton.png" align="left" />

The selected task in the step 1, is now child of the task above. The parent task change the color to green and is resized to fit the child task.

The right identation works only for one task, if you want to make one task parent of many tasks, you have to do the step one for all the tasks you want to be childs.
